Class SaveHTTPState

java.lang.Object
com.example.SpotifyWebAPI.HTTP.SaveHTTPState
public final class SaveHTTPState extends Object
Saves the HTTP Server state in a Hashmap with its name to manage multiple servers at the same time on different ports
